channel.title: How could i make this?
channel.description:
i want to make it so i can do ::setlvls personsname skill# skilllvl
for 317 delta
how cud i make that??

item.title: How could i make this?
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

OHHH MY BAD. just edit in char file. idk for other plays, maybe make statues at staff zone that give xp. lol =S

item.title: How could i make this?
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

[quote=“nickypie, post:2, topic:410268”] if (command.startsWith("setlevel")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int skillID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int level = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); playerXP[skillID] = getXPForLevel(level); playerLevel[skillID] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[skillID]); refreshSkills(); sM("Set level to " + level + "."); } else { sM("Invalid format, use as - ::setlevel SKILLID LEVEL"); } }

kthx[/quote]

wont this just set my own levels… not another players

Read full topic

item.title: How could i make this?
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

if (command.startsWith("setlevel")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int skillID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int level = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); playerXP[skillID] = getXPForLevel(level); playerLevel[skillID] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[skillID]); refreshSkills(); sM("Set level to " + level + "."); } else { sM("Invalid format, use as - ::setlevel SKILLID LEVEL"); } }

kthx
